title: [Large-scale] Apprenticeship-based Professional Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and practical experience in relevant professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Emphasis on professional problem-solving competencies through project-based assessment in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Apply practical math problem-solving strategies based on apprenticeship learning models with over 80% accuracy

Learners, in teams of 3–5, can represent one real-world case from the medical/legal/technical fields with a mathematical model (differential equations, statistical analysis, optimization techniques, etc.), submit a 5–10-page report with solutions within four weeks, and achieve a "B+" (80+ points) grade in two or more of three rubric items (model appropriateness, computational accuracy, practicality).
Complete data analysis and visualization projects using digital tools to produce practical, real-world applicable results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
